title: Cable Replacement Works for Circle Line on 17 March

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between#Mounbatten and #PayaLebar are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Today from 5:30am-10am, Circle Line shuttle train service between #Mounbatten and #PayaLebar stations due to power cable change.
[CCL]: Today from 5:30am-10am, Circle Line shuttle train service between #Mounbatten to #PayaLebar stations due to power cable change.
[CCL]Today from 5.30am-10am, Circle Line shuttle train service between #Mountbatten and #Paya Lebar stations due to power cable change.
[CCL]On 17 March,5.30am-10am,bridging train service for CCL Cable Replacement Works between Mountbatten & Paya Lebar  http://t.co/1FM62yMJpo
